node_1: dragonball evolution: original motion picture soundtrack
edge: Brian Tyler composed the score for Dragonball Evolution: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack, which was recorded with an 82-piece ensemble of the Hollywood Studio Symphony at the Newman Scoring Stage at 20th Century Fox.

node_1: dragonball evolution: original motion picture soundtrack
edge: Varèse Sarabande released the Dragonball Evolution: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack in the United States on March 17, 2009.

node_2: dragonball evolution: original motion picture soundtrack
edge: American pop artist Brian Anthony's remixed song 'Worked Up' is featured on the Dragonball Evolution: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack and included as a bonus feature on the home video releases.

node_2: dragonball evolution: original motion picture soundtrack
edge: Japanese singer Ayumi Hamasaki's song 'Rule' is the theme song for Dragonball Evolution and featured on the Dragonball Evolution: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack.
